channel.title: Conection lost by kill spirit beast
channel.description:
i have add the npc (spirit beast) in npc.cfg and alot of that things (and in auto spawner) but now i kill him 1 sec later conection lost how to kill the conection lost.??
thanks from j3ss3tj3

item.title: Conection lost by kill spirit beast
item.dc:creator: @dy3p8ntrkid dy3p8ntrkid
item.description:
@dy3p8ntrkid wrote:

Make sure you have everything right in Autospawn.cfg and Npc.cfg
For Example:
This is in Autospawn.cfg
General_Graardor it goes, NPC ID—Coordx—Coordy and the 1 is spawn 1 I’m pretty sure…

spawn = 1115	2902	2735	0	0	0	0	0	1

This is in Npc.cfg
General_Graardor it goes, NPC ID–NPC NAME–NPCCOMBAT—NPCHEALTH—NPCRESPAWN

npc = 1115	General_Graardor		113	400	40

Hopefully this helps, if you have a question still let me know.

Read full topic
